items.content_html: klaf.js is a lightweight JavaScript library offering both a key-value store and document-oriented database with asynchronous operations. Optimized for performance and flexibility, it is ideal for modern applications requiring fast, schema-defined data storage.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool to generate invigilation schedules for school exams. Input teacher data and exam routines, and get a clear, organized schedule with duty distribution charts. Export everything to a neat PDF.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.

items.content_html: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.
items.title: bukhtyarhaider/HummiGrab: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.
items.title: Phillip-Kemper/mcp-analytics-middleware: A lightweight TypeScript middleware for MCP SDK servers that delivers analytics. Captures request metrics, performance data, and usage patterns with minimal overhead. Features real-time monitoring, configurable data collection, and detailed reporting - all with full type safety.
